name: Defense
description: For those who stand unbroken, shielding others from chaos and leading through courage and conviction.

features.name: Hold the Line
features.description: When a hostile creature you can see moves within 5 ft of you, you may use your Reaction to make a melee attack. On a hit, the creature's speed becomes 0 until the end of your next turn.

features.name: Read the Threat
features.description: At the start of combat, you may make an Insight check with advantage to identify the most dangerous visible enemy (TN 8+DR). On a success, your first attack against that enemy has advantage.

features.name: Unyielding Focus
features.description: You have advantage on saves made to resist being knocked prone, disarmed, or shoved.
